attributes.action: Stop all illegal migrants entering the UK
attributes.additional_details: British tax payers are sick of illegal migrants entering the UK either known or unknown, the British people are fed up and disgusted by these migrants getting everything free, it is taking it's toll on this country and it needs to stop now.
attributes.background: We the UK people want an end to illegal migrants entering the UK, any that do are to be sent back from where they travelled from, UK tax payers are sick of this country giving hand outs to people arriving on the shores of Britain. we demand that this is stopped.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601727
